main event: On December 7, 1958, seven objects were observed flying in formation over Montevideo, Uruguay.
interesting points: The objects were visible due to city lights reflecting off them,The objects did not rotate as the observer could see two distinct points beneath each one,The objects flew silently at an altitude of approximately 2,000 meters and a speed of 1,500 kilometers per hour,They covered a 45-degree arc in 6 seconds,The formation was irregular, suggesting some form of magnetic force keeping them together.
witness description: The observer was a 40-year-old aviator with 25 years of experience in aviation, qualified to identify aerial objects.
